question.questiontext: The carnassial teeth of a carnivorous animal consist of the
question.optiona: last upper premolar and the first lower molar
question.optionb: last upper molar and the last lower molar
question.optionc: first upper premolar and the first lower molar
question.optiond: first upper molar and the first lower molar

question.optionb: the kings are bigger than the queens

question.optionc: photosynthesis occurs in the leaves of plants

question.questiontext: When a marine fish was taken from the ocean and put in a tank of fresh water, it died after a short period because
question.optiona: the tank was too small compared to the large ocean
question.optionb: the body cells of the fish swelled and burst as a result of the hypotonic fresh water
question.optionc: the body cells of the fish shrank as their sap was hypertonic to the fresh water
question.optiond: there was no food in the tank, so the fish starved.

question.questiontext: To select and retain the desirable trait of large body size which a farmer has observed in his herd, the farmer needs to

question.optionb: cross-breed his animals with a different herd
question.optionc: inbreed the animals in his herd
